page.title: 071. EMPLOYMENT INNERLEITHEN
page.content: In the{Waverley Spinning Mill}they use man made fibres from England, Ireland,Italy,East Germany.120 people employed.Fibres are dyed,carded and spun.15 tonnes of yarn is spun weekly. Pay averages Â£100 weekly. Sell to U.K.Hong Kong,Europe,Australia {Glenevan:}16 hand intarsia machines produce garments in cashmere and silk. Partners Gilchrist and White opened a small mill{"Gilchrist's"}in order to use their own designs.Raw cashmere is bought in Canton,S. Russia,Iran.They knit intarsia with shetland lambswool and cashmere.42 workers knit 100 garments a day.Export to America,Japan Italy,France.Nearby we found a water wheel still workable. {Caldwells}(Opened 1911) make homemade icecream from a secret recipe.It is of high quality and is in much demand by visitors and locals alike.
